Detailed Description

This class provides methods to embed ads in an application. 

 class AdsExample : public gaia::ads::IAdListener {
 public:
      Create();
      void onAdReceived(const gaia::Ads::AdView& adView,
                                int32_t errorCode, const gaia::base::String& errorMsg);
 };
 AdsExample::Create() {
     AdView* pAdView = new AdView(L"0219494509", BANNER_PORT_480_800, this);
     pAdView->loadAd();
 }
 AdsExample::onAdReceived(const gaia::Ads::AdView& adView,
                                       int32_t errorCode, const gaia::base::String& errorMsg) {
     if(errorCode == ...) {
          ...
     }
     else {
          ...
     }
 }
